remarks.format: ## Remarks 在回傳期間呼叫方法。The method is called during postback. 配接器可以處理事件。An adapter can choose to handle the event. 類別不會處理回傳事件，而且一律傳回`false`。The class does not handle the postback event and always returns `false`.

para.span: 當覆寫方法在衍生類別中，如果您想要您的頁面配置器來處理回傳事件中，傳回之後處理事件。

span.span: When overriding the method in a derived class, if you want your page adapter to handle the postback event, return after handling the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些裝置可在連結或按鈕只執行回傳事件。Some devices are able to execute a postback event on a link or button only. 方法寫入 URL，其中包含所有的資訊，才能處理表單和更新並顯示頁面的連結。The method writes a link with a URL that contains all of the information that is required to process the form and to update and display the page.
